name: Subnet
shortDesc: Creates a subnet in an existing VPC.

properties.name: AvailabilityZone
properties.desc: The availability zone in which you want the subnet. Default: AWS selects a zone for you (recommended).

properties.name: CidrBlock
properties.desc: The CIDR block that you want the subnet to cover (for example, "10.0.0.0/24").

properties.name: MapPublicIpOnLaunch
properties.desc: Indicates whether instances that are launched in this subnet receive a public IP address. By default, the value is false.

properties.name: Tags
properties.desc: An arbitrary set of tags (keyâ€“value pairs) for this subnet.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.desc: A Ref structure that contains the ID of the VPC on which you want to create the subnet. The VPC ID is provided as the value of the "Ref" property, as: { "Ref": "VPCID" }.

attributes.name: AvailabilityZone
attributes.desc: Returns the availability zone (for example, "us-east-1a") of this subnet.Example: { "Fn::GetAtt" : [ "mySubnet", "AvailabilityZone" ] }
